content.title: 5. Rich
content.author: Didier Fanchon
content.subtitle: Richesse
content.paragraph:
Content Management, Document Management, Collaborative Spaces, Corporate Social Networking: thanks to Rubedo, all uses of Web 2.0 are allowed. Even better, they were designed and integrated into a coherent whole from the start of the design of the tool, unlike solutions that are built for over 10 years that have been completely disrupted.

Rubedo provides a centralized platform for creating websites, intranet, extranet, adapted to the latest uses of Web 2.0
